Message Queues
[Real-Time Operation System]

Detailed Description

Provides RTOS message queues.


Enumerations

enum  
 Possible sizes of the queue elements. More...

 Close a message queue.

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum
 

Possible sizes of the queue elements.

Function Documentation

HRESULT TCMsgQueueOpen (  uint32 *  queueID,
uint32  elemSizeQuads,
void *  queueStart,
uint32  queueSize,
BOOL  bUseSema
) 
 

Create a new message queue.

Parameters:
queueID The address to place the new queue ID in.
elemSizeQuads The size of the queue elements in quadlets.
queueStart The start of the memory to use for the queue.
queueSize The size of the queue memory.
bUseSema Use a semaphore to make the queue thread safe.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT TCMsgQueueClose (  uint32  queueID  ) 
 

Close a message queue.

Parameters:
queueID The ID of the queue to close.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT TCMsgQueueReset (  uint32  queueID  ) 
 

Reset a message queue.

Parameters:
queueID The ID of the queue to close.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT TCMsgQueueGetNoOfItems (  uint32  queueID,
uint32 *  items
) 
 

Obtain the number of items in a queue.

Parameters:
queueID The ID of the queue to use.
items The address to place the number of items in.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT TCMsgQueueSend (  uint32  queueID,
void *  pSrc,
uint32  msec
) 
 

Send data to a queue.

Parameters:
queueID The ID of the queue to use.
pSrc The address of the data to send.
msec TC_WAIT_FOREVER, TC_NO_WAIT or timeout time in milliseconds.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.

HRESULT TCMsgQueueReceive (  uint32  queueID,
void *  pDst,
uint32  msec
) 
 

Receive from a queue.

Parameters:
queueID The ID of the queue to use.
pDst The address to copy the queue message into.
msec TC_WAIT_FOREVER, TC_NO_WAIT or timeout time in milliseconds.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.
